title: Third-Party Ad Targeting including Cookies, JavaScript and Web Beacons.

tosdr.tldr:
Softpedia allows third-party advertising to be displayed on their site which may use cookies, JavaScript or Web Beacons to measure ad effectiveness or personalize ad content.

While Softpedia notes that they do not share any 'personally identifiable information' with these third-party ad servers or ad networks (except in specific programs or features which are opt-out), they may receive information regarding how you use Softpedia Sites.
